title: Helvetica Neue Condensed mixed with Alternate Gothic No.2
author: dudedu

comments.content: I thing it's **[Bebas Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125746/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Bebas%20Neue%20-%20Regular&fid=855c60cea8ab2eed7695fe3d106b5029&fsize=60&text=LAD%20STAY&fit=1)** free font by Ryoichi Tsunekawa [Dharma Type, 2010]
As always Fivos has it - I agree it is Bebas Neue
Brilliant, your a genius. Thanks again fvilanakis.
